title: The True Mage
body:
This champions is a champion that uses Health and mana to cast abilities that deals heavy true damage.

Passive: A Word Of Truth
Gain 3/4/5/6%AP as bonus True Damage on spells.
Every 6th spell deals True Damage from bonus effect.

Q: Power Slam  15% CURRENT HP 60/65/70/75/80 MP  13/11.5/10/8.5/7 seconds.
After a 1.25 second delay, the True Mage slams a block of Pure Power onto an enemy within 375 range. He can move but if hit by hard cc this will be cancelled.
Deals 70/150/230/310/390 +35%AP Magic Damage.

Bonus Effect: Curses the hit enemy for 5 seconds, their next spell cast goes on a 20/30/40/50/60%  Longer Cooldown.
Deals 10/15/20/25/30% AP as BONUS TRUE DAMAGE.


W: OverPower  5% CUrrent HP per Tick. 10 + 2/4/7/11/16 MP/second 5 second cooldown. 650/700/750/800/850 Range.
Channels while firing a continuous ray that slows the enemy hit by 10/14/18/22/26%.
Dealing 4/8/12/16/20 +5/6/7/8/9%AP Magic damage per .5 seconds.

Every 6th tick deals 3% ENEMY MAX HP AS BONUS TRUE DAMAGE.

E: Ray of Life.  12% CUrrent HP +60/140/220/300/380 HP
Passive: Dealing damage to champions increases healing by 1/2/3/4/5 HP per 5 second for 40 seconds. Stacks 10/20/30/40/50 times.
Burns the opponent for Pure True Damage equal to 30/60/100/150/210 +15/20/25/30/35%AP.
 
If Passive is applied, Deal another 6/7/8/9/10% Enemy MAX HP as True Damage.


R: Infinity Blast. 25% MAXIMUM HEALTH drain over channel duration. 300MP 260/230/200 second cooldown.
Upon selection of a target within 1200/1500/1800 range, True Mage begins Channeling for 10/9/8 seconds.
Upon finishing his channel, he releases a huge blast of Infinite potential towards the opponent.
Dealing 300/650/1000 + 10/20/30% MAX HP + 100/125/150%AP as TRUE DAMAGE.
While channeling, nearby units within 500 range are silenced as major energy is drained form the surrounding locations.

After the cast however, True Mage is harmed as well, losing 100/90/80% AP that recovers over 20 seconds.

This Deals 5% More TD for every unit silenced during the channel. UP to 25% more TD if 5 enemy champs are silenced.

THe Blast cannot be blocked or negated by any means and will deal damage even to invulnerable targets as MAGIC DAMAGE instead.

Killing the target reduces cooldown by 2 seconds PERMANENTLY.



Being killed due to health all drained during channeling for Infinity Blast causes true mage to start to evaporate as he gasps and reaches out.
Upon dissapearing a sound is broadcasted accrossed the rift, he knows.
